--- title: "NARC-1" format: html: code-fold: true --- ## Overview NARC-1 is the first HF station on your left as you enter the station. ![NARC-1 operating position](include/img/narc-1-operating-position.jpeg) ### Equipment summary - [Icom IC-7610 (HF + 6m) transceiver](icom-ic-7610.qmd) - Astron RS-35A power supply - Icom SM-50 desk mic - Clipper PTT footswitch - Heil Pro-7 headset - Nifty mini-manual and other manuals - Check the right side of the operating position and the drawer under the radio. - HP PC, dual monitor set-up - Elecraft [KPA1500](KPA1500.qmd) amplifier - Elecraft power supply ### Connection scheme ```{mermaid} %%| fig-width: 6.5 %%| fig-label: fig-narc1-connections %%| fig-cap: "Connection diagram for NARC1 IC-7610" flowchart TD A[IC-7610] ---|Coax-Ant1|B[KPA-1500 Ant 1] A ---|RCA ALC|B A ---|RCA Send|B A --> M(Morse Paddles) A ---|USB|C[NARC1 PC] A ---|Power Cable|E(Astron RS-35A) K[Halibut Electronics Radio Pro] ---|ICOM Mic/PTT Cable|A ``` ```{mermaid} %%| fig-width: 6.5 %%| fig-label: fig-narc1-connections %%| fig-cap: "Connection diagram for NARC1 PC" flowchart TD A[IC-7610] ---|USB|C[NARC1 PC] C ---|USB|F(Keyboard) C ---|Bluetooth|G(Mouse) C ---|HDMI|H(Monitor) C ---|CAT6|L(Network Switch) J[Astron RS-35A] ---|AC Power|C ``` ```{mermaid} %%| fig-width: 6.5 %%| fig-label: fig-narc1-connections %%| fig-cap: "Connection diagram for NARC1 Halibut Electronics Audio" flowchart TD K[Halibut Electronics Radio Pro] ---|ICOM Cable|A[IC-7610] K ---|Cat5|J[Halibut Electronics Contest Console] K ---|PowerPole|J J ---|PowerPole|E(Astron RS-35A) L[Heil Pro-7] --> M[Halibut Electronics User Pro] N[Other headset] --> O[Halibut Electronics User Pro] M ---|Cat5|J O ---|Cat5|J P[Ext Speaker] --- K Q[Clipper footwitch] --- K ``` ### Software summary ::: {.callout-note} These sections are generated by parsing a CSV data file in `include/csv/software_versions.csv`. The code is hidden in the output for aesthetic reasons, but may be revealed by examining the source code file. ::: ::: {.cell} ::: #### Operating System ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
software version date
MS Windows 10 2024-05-22
````` ::: ::: #### Digital modes ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}

````` ::: ::: ### Operating Guide The operating guide is found under [Rigs/IC-7610 section](icom-ic-7610.qmd).
